errors.no-providers: No wallet providers found or no detected providers had been found.
errors.connect-error: An error occured when connecting the wallet provider with the site.
errors.insufficient-funds: The command had been declined, the wallet have insufficient funds to complete the request.
errors.wallet-address-error: An error occured when attempting to gather the wallet address.
errors.wallet-signer-error: An error occured when attempting to gather the signer (owner) of the wallet.
errors.wallet-no-window-error: No wallet found. Please try to install a wallet provider, example Metamask.
errors.ask-admin-error: Communicate with the site admin. Give him this error message :

product.not-found: Sorry the search product requested is not found. Please, try again with others settings.
product.empty: Sorry but your basket is empty, can you fill it before attempting to try gather a product?

basket.btn-full-tooltip: Your basket have fruits in it

products.name: Name
products.remove-btn-tooltip: Remove this product from the basket

orders.title: Your orders
orders.empty-commands: Empty Orders. You can try your first order by choosing a merchant and buy one of their products.
